channel.title: Looking For 1 Experienced Java Developer
channel.description:
[center]Hello Mopar, I am currently looking for a very experienced Java developer who is looking to become a part of the next biggest server. I will say now that I have very, VERY little java knowledge. My role is to oversee the server, make sure everything is running as it should be. YOUR job will be to add constant updates/new content, and also add many of the unique ideas I have for the server.[/center]
[center]The server is going to be a PI based PK'ing server. I have A LOT of very good, and new ideas that will help our server become #1. I will take care of all expenses when I feel that the server is where it should be. If I think you have been doing well, a contract may be discussed.[/center]
[center]The Server: 317 PI Lost Legacy Source + Client[/center]
[center]If anyone is interested, please contact me via skype at: xerobots also, leave an application:
Age: Years of Java Experience: Previous Work:
^^^ It is perfectly fine if you are young, or don't have previous work to show - I am looking for someone who is CURRENTLY skilled. [/center]

item.title: Looking For 1 Experienced Java Developer
item.dc:creator: @Slave2 Slave.
item.description:
